sentences.en: ...the leader of the now defunct Social Democratic Party.
sentences.cn: …现已不存在的社会民主党的领袖。

sentences.en: A family name becomes defunct when the only heir dies any son.
sentences.cn: 当唯一的继承人死去了之后没儿子,那这个姓就要绝迹了.

sentences.en: A family name becomes defunct when the only heir dies without any son.
sentences.cn: 某姓单传绝后,该姓就从此消亡了.

sentences.en: But the specter of the defunct Superconducting Supercollider — and the money the project ended up wasting — looms large.
sentences.cn: 这是高能物理学家梦寐以求的新机器,但是,那半路夭折的[超导超级对撞机],以及该计画所虚掷的金钱,却仍是阴魂不散.

sentences.en: Faberg é , a defunct jewellery - maker known for its gem - encrusted eggs, relaunched in September.
sentences.cn: 这家公司曾以制作宝石镶嵌蛋闻名.

sentences.en: Legendary, defunct Japanese toymaker Popy launched the Chogokin series in 1973.
sentences.cn: 目前已经不存在的玩具商POPY公司在1973年首创了“Chogokin”系列.

sentences.en: My February submission to the now defunct Monthly Character Exchange.
sentences.cn: 为了网上人物交换画展(现以停办)画的礼物?二零零一年二月版.

sentences.en: My November submission for the now defunct Monthly Character Exchange.
sentences.cn: 为了网上人物交换画展(现以停办)画的礼物?二零零零年十一月版.

sentences.en: The party was widely thought defunct after the Tigers'rout.
sentences.cn: 普遍认为TNA在猛虎组织溃败后便形同虚设.

sentences.en: They bought all their equipment from a defunct brewery in Manhattan.
sentences.cn: 他们那些设备都是从曼哈顿一家已经关闭的啤酒厂购买的。

sentences.en: Up a tower to a defunct revolving restaurant, where I snapped photos of the hazy skyline.
sentences.cn: 上了塔，到了一颓败的旋转餐厅，那里我对着朦胧地天空的轮廓，拍了照片。

sentences.en: When he found himself cheated and traced back the company has been defunct.
sentences.cn: 当他发现被骗了找回那家公司,发现它已经(死的,非现存的,不存在)了.

trans.tran_cn: <正>已故的，不存在的，无效的，失效的，非现存的
trans.tran_en: not existing any more, or not useful any more
